A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Extremely disappointing. The film had very little plot\, essentially it could have been summed up in an half hour film. The battles we're lackluster; that is\, there was very little character development\, and it felt\, at times\, a bit rushed.\n\nI hope they fire this entire writing and directing team.
